janksMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
janksMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

janksMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
janksMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
janksMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

janksMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
janksMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

janksMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
janksMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !janksMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

janksMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
janksMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !janksMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
